name: Zoological Era II (itch)
description:
Creature-battling real-time action-RPG. Battle 2D characters in 3D space. Animal types have even more depth, while retaining the traits that made each type so distinguishable. Experience the challenges of each one, with new battle dynamics to add to the gameplay.

• Real-time gameplay
• Quick Battle mode for selecting characters to join you and to fight against in a single match.
• Animal types to choose from, each with their own dynamics, weaknesses, and resistances.
• Environmental temperature, which affects cold-blooded and warm-blooded animals in different ways.
• Arcade mode for increasingly difficult enemies.
• Hand-drawn character animation
• Single-player
• Lore and culture of a fantasy world

----------------------------------------------------

Minimum Requirements

        Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
        OS: Windows 8.1
        Processor: Intel Celeron CPU 1007U @ 1.5 GHz
        Memory: 1 GB RAM
        Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
        DirectX: Version 11
        Storage: 200 MB available space
        Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
